titles: By the King A proclamation of grace and pardon to all such as shall returne to their obedience, and submit to, and seek His Majesties mercy before the end of May next.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, Printer to the University,
notes: With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Oxford, the 19th day of April, in the one and twentieth yeare of Our Raigne. 1645.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
